event_name: Build & Bloom: Akave's Decentralized Storage Workshop

sessions.name: Welcome & Networking
sessions.description: Connect with fellow builders and the Akave team over coffee and snacks, and hear a brief introduction to the day's workshop structure.

sessions.name: Oasis SDK & API Workshop
sessions.description:
​A hands-on session to explore Akave’s SDK and S3-compatible API. Learn how to integrate decentralized storage into your applications through guided exercises.

30-minute Intro/Demo: An overview of the SDK and API, highlighting key features and real-world applications. 

​Guided Tasks: Gain exclusive access to Akave’s Yucca Testnet to work on uploading and downloading files, testing storage resilience, and more. 

​Live Support: Akave team members will be available to assist and answer questions throughout the session.

sessions.name: AI Bloom: Decentralize Your Models
sessions.description: Discover how to decentralize your AI/LLM models using Akave’s infrastructure. This session includes a live demo followed by a hands-on mini-hack.

sessions.name: Dogfooding Session & Feedback Session
sessions.description: ​Test Akave’s S3-compatible API with real-world tasks, such as uploading data from the cloud. Share feedback on your experience, discuss essential API calls, and help shape future developments.

sessions.name: 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - Closing & Networking  Wrap up
sessions.description: Wrap up with an informal networking session to continue discussions, exchange ideas, and connect with fellow builders.
